TitleEnglish: Trinity Seven: Heavens Library & Crimson Lord
SummaryEnglish: Bringing back Arata, Lilith and the rest of the Trinity Seven to face off against the greatest enemy in the history of the team; Lilith's own father, the strongest Demon Lord, who challenges Arata, now a Demon Lord candidate herself.
Aliases: 劇場版 トリニティセブン -天空図書館と真紅の魔王-
Gekijouban Toriniti Sebun: Tenkuu Toshokan to Shinku no Maou
